1: <pb/><t>Re' Dios xuq'oreej taqe i Q'atal q'orik noq kimolom kiib',</t> <t>xuq'at i q'orik chikinaah, je' wili xuq'or keh:</t>
2: <t>¿Ko jaruuj taq i namay i q'ataj q'orik ma' re' ta parub'ehel?</t> <t>¿Mi ma' naa taq akanaam kitoob'jiik re' i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al?</t>
3: <t>Chako'leej la' taq i ma' kow ta ruk'ux, i ma' xta rutuut rajaaw.</t> <t>Eh parub'ehel taq chaq'at i q'orik chinaah i ti' ruk'ux, eh i ma' xta wilik reh.</t>
4: <t>Cha ko'leej taqe i ma' kow ta kik'ux,</t> <t>je' wo' taqe i ma' xta wilik keh, pan kiq'ab' i yiib' wach kina'ojb'al.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Re' taq i hat ma' aweht'al ta taq,</t> <t>ma' nareq ta taq chi riij, pam q'equm taq k'acharik i na a'n.</t> <t>Xa kib'arb'otik chik i wilkeeb' wach ak'al taq awuum.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Re' hin, hat naq taq jilow dios noq xat xnukanaa'.</t> <t>Eh hat naq taq manlik wak'uun noq nuq'or, i hin i Dios nim awajaawriik.</t>
7: <t>Eh naa taq akimiik je' rukab' noq inkimik xa awach.</t> <t>Eh chi je' rukab' noq insacharik wach i q'atal q'orik xakow i rub'an riib', inki Dios.</t>
8: <pb/><t>QaJaaw Dios, chaq'at i Q'orik chikinaah wilkeeb' wach ak'al,</t> <t>ruum re' i hat i ehchan reh i chu'nchel i tinamit.</t>
